questions.questionText:
Write a JS function render_questions from the earlier created JSON object data.

  • Take the JSON data model as the argument to the render_questions

Write a JS function render_questions from the earlier created JSON object data.

  • Function retrieves the questions and its choices and displays it on the console

Write a JS function render_questions from the earlier created JSON object data.

  • The render_questions function is called on page load
